reviewText: For years, time travel has been our dream and our fantasy. We have striven to beat time moving faster and faster...first by horse, then train, car, jet and space rocket. Now, science is giving us hope that we may soon be able to travel faster than light itself...breaking barriers, that, for centuries, were considered unbreakable. Time Travel concludes that the prevailing thought is now leaning more heavily than ever towards the possibility that people will be ableTime Travel, before too long, to beat the clock and literally step into the past, that time as we know it may soon be changed forever.
